extDescription.message: Blocks new tabs from specified websites

urlBeginDesc.message: URLs that start with one of the listed URL beginnings will be blocked from opening new tabs

wrongUrlPatternPromt.message:
The input '$url$' does not seem to follow the pattern 'https://www.example.com'.

Do you want to add it anyways?

emptyUrlPromt.message:
The input is empty. This will block tab opening from every website.

Do you want to add it?
